result.title: How to solve uva 11651 ( Krypton Number System) ??
result.content: Problem link: https://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p11651.pdf . I know how to convert it to matrix exponentiation, On my solution the matrix is 77*77 size. as there are 200 test case and the matrix may be powered to 10^9 , It will case time limit exceed though O(n^3log(m)). How to make it time efficient ??
